doc.repnme: Telling our story : Africa - the power of the private sector
doc.abstracts: This issue focuses on IFC's support for Africa, where commitments may reach a record $3.7 billion this year. It includes human interest stories on leading investment and advisory projects from several countries. The focus is on three key ways IFC builds the private sector in Africa: Improving the Investment Climate, Encouraging Entrepreneurship, and Transforming Key Markets and Industries.
